Class LayoutTransitionManager

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Layout
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Provides a minimal API for animating layout transitions (node position changes) without coupling to layout algorithms.

public sealed class LayoutTransitionManager

Methods

AnimateTo(IReadOnlyDictionary<string, Point>, double, Func<double, double>?, Action?)

Animates node positions to the provided target positions. Nodes not included in targetPositions are not modified.

public void AnimateTo(IReadOnlyDictionary<string, Point> targetPositions, double duration = 0.35, Func<double, double>? easing = null, Action? onComplete = null)
